trans-unit.source: "Give the date(s) of creation of the unit being described either as a single date, or range of dates (for inclusive dates and/or predominant dates). Always give the inclusive dates. When providing predominant dates, specify them as such, preceded by the word predominant..." (RAD 1.4B2) Record probable and uncertain dates in square brackets, using the conventions described in 1.4B5.
trans-unit.target: "Achegue a(s) data(s) de creación da unidade que se describe xa sexa como unha única data ou un rango de datas (para datas inclusivas e/ou datas predominantes). Sempre Achegue as datas inclusivas. Cando se Acheguen datas predominantes, especifíqueas como tales, precedidas pola palabra predominante..." (RAD 1.4B2) Rexistre Datas probables e inciertas en corchetes cuadrados, usando as convencións descritas en 1.4B5.

trans-unit.source: "Make notes on dates and any details pertaining to the dates of creation, publication, or distribution, of the unit being described that are not included in the Date(s) of creation, including publication, distribution, etc., area and that are considered to be important." (RAD 1.8B8) "Make notes on the date(s) of accumulation or collection of the unit being described." (RAD 1.8B8a)
Select the type of activity that established the relation between the authority record and the archival description (e.g. creation, accumulation, collection, publication, etc.)
trans-unit.target: Seleccione o tipo de actividade que estableciou a relación entre o rexistro de autoridade e a descrición arquivística (ex. creación, acumulación, colección, publicación, etc.)

trans-unit.source: This archival description requires at least one date.
trans-unit.target: Esta descrición arquivística require polo menos unha data.

trans-unit.source: Date(s) - are not consistent with %1%higher levels%2%.
trans-unit.target: Data(s) - non son consistentes coos %1%niveis superiores%2%.

trans-unit.source: Physical description - This is a mandatory element.
trans-unit.target: Descrición física - Este é un elemento obrigatorio.

trans-unit.source: Scope and content - This is a mandatory element.
trans-unit.target: Alcance e contido - Este elemento é obrigatorio.

trans-unit.source: Title - This is a mandatory element.
trans-unit.target: Título - Este é un elemento obrigatorio.

trans-unit.source: Level of description - Value "%value%" is not consistent with higher levels.
trans-unit.target: Nivel de descrición - O valor "%value%" no é consistente cos niveis superiores.

trans-unit.source: Level of description - This is a mandatory element.
trans-unit.target: Nivel de descrición - Este é un elemento obrigatorio.

trans-unit.source: Statement of scale (architectural) - This is a mandatory element for architectural drawing.
trans-unit.target: Mención da escala (arquitectónica) - Este é un elemento obrigatorio para planos arquitectónicos

trans-unit.source: Statement of coordinates (cartographic) - This is a mandatory element for cartographic material.
trans-unit.target: Mención de coordenadas (cartográfica) - Este é un elemento obrigatorio para material cartográfico.

trans-unit.source: Statement of projection (cartographic) - This is a mandatory element for cartographic material.
trans-unit.target: Mención de proxección (cartográfica) - Este é un elemento obrigatorio para material cartográfico.

trans-unit.source: Statement of scale (cartographic) - This is a mandatory element for cartographic material.
trans-unit.target: Mención da escala (cartográfica) - Este é un elemento obrigatorio para material cartográfico

trans-unit.source: Issuing jurisdiction and denomination (philatelic) - This is a mandatory element for philatelic record.
trans-unit.target: Xurisdicción de emisión e denominación (filatélico) - Este é un elemento obrigatorio para un rexistro filatélico

trans-unit.source: Title and statement of responsibility area
trans-unit.target: Área de título e declaración de responsabilidade

trans-unit.source: Edit title and statement of responsibility area
trans-unit.target: Editar área de título e declaración de responsabilidade

trans-unit.source: Class of material specific details area
trans-unit.target: Área de detalles específicos da clase de material

trans-unit.source: Edit class of material specific details area
trans-unit.target: Editar área de detalles específicos de clase de material
Editar área de Datas de creación
Título apropiado das series do editor

trans-unit.source: Other title information of publisher's series
trans-unit.target: Outra información de título das series editoriais

trans-unit.source: Statement of responsibility relating to publisher's series
trans-unit.target: Declaración de responsabilidade relativa a ás series editoriais

trans-unit.source: Terms governing use, reproduction, and publication
trans-unit.target: Condicións de uso, reproducción e publicación

trans-unit.source: Dates of creation, revision and deletion
trans-unit.target: Datas de creación, revisión ou eliminación

trans-unit.source: This is a duplicate of record %1%
trans-unit.target: Este é un rexistro duplicado de %1%

trans-unit.source: Enter the title proper, either transcribed or supplied. (RAD 1.1B)
trans-unit.target: Ingrese un título apropiado, ben sexa transcrito ou suministrado. (RAD 1.1B)

trans-unit.source: Select the General Material Designation at the highest level of description. If there are more than three, select "multiple media" (RAD 1.1C)
"[W]hen applicable, transcribe parallel titles that appear in conjunction with the formal title proper..." (RAD 1.1D)
trans-unit.target: Cando sexa aplicable, transcriba os títulos paralelos que aparecen en conxunción co título formal apropiado..." (RAD 1.1D)

trans-unit.source: "Transcribe other title information that appears in conjunction with the formal title proper..." (RAD 1.1E)
trans-unit.target: "Transcriba outra información do título que apareza en conxunto co título formal apropiado..." (RAD 1.1E)

trans-unit.source: "At the item level of description, transcribe explicit statements of responsibility appearing in conjunction with the formal title proper in or on the chief source of information..." (RAD 1.1F)
trans-unit.target: "No nivel de descrición de ítem, Transcriba as declaracións de responsabilidadee explícitas que aparecen en conxunción co título formal apropiado, en ou sobre a fonte de información principal..." (RAD 1.1F)

trans-unit.source: Select a level of description from the drop-down menu. See RAD 1.0A for rules and conventions on selecting levels of description.
trans-unit.target: Seleccione un nivel de descrición dende o menú despregable. Ver RAD 1.0A para regras e convencións ao seleccionar niveis de descrición.

trans-unit.source: Select the repository that has custody and control of the archival material. The values in this field are drawn from the Authorized form of name field in archival institution records. Search for an existing name by typing the first few characters of the name. Alternatively, type a new name to create and link to a new archival institution.
Enter an unambiguous code used to uniquely identify the description.
trans-unit.target: Ingrese un código non ambiguo usado para identificar únicamente a descrición.

trans-unit.source: "Transcribe a statement of responsibility relating to one or more editions, but not to all editions, of the item being described following the edition statement if there is one." (RAD 1.2.C1) "When describing the first edition, give all statements of responsibility in the Title and statement of responsibility area." (RAD 1.2C2)
trans-unit.target: "Transcriba unha declaración de responsabilidade relacionada a unha o máis edicións, pero non para todas as edicións, para os ítems que se describen seguindo a declaración de edición, se hai alguna." (RAD 1.2.C1) "Cando se decribe a primeira edición, Achegue todas as declaracións de responsabilidade no Título e área de declaración de responsabilidade." (RAD 1.2C2)

trans-unit.source: Statement of responsibility relating to the edition
trans-unit.target: Declaración de responsabilidade relativa á edición

trans-unit.source: "Give the scale of the unit being described...as a representative fraction (RF) expressed as a ratio (1: ). Precede the ratio by Scale. Give the scale even if it is already recorded as part of the title proper or other title information." (RAD 5.3B1)
trans-unit.target: "Achegue a escala da unidade que se describe... como unha fracción representativa expresada como unha proporción (1: ). Procedá proporción por Escala. Achegue a escala incluso se xa foi rexistrada como parte do título ou outra información do título." (RAD 5.3B1)

trans-unit.source: "Give the statement of projection if it is found on the prescribed source(s) of information." (RAD 5.3C1)
trans-unit.target: "Achegue a declaración de proxección se está fundada na(s) fonte(s) de información prescrita." (RAD 5.3C1)

trans-unit.source: "At the fonds, series or file levels, record coordinates for the maximum coverage provided by the materials in the unit, as long as they are reasonably contiguous." (RAD 5.3D)
trans-unit.target: "Nos fondos, series ou niveis de arquivo, rexistre as coordenadas para cobertura máxima provistas polos materiais na unidade, sempre que sexan razonablemente parellas." (RAD 5.3D)

trans-unit.source: "Give in English the scale in the units of measure found on the unit being described. If there is no English equivalent for the name of the unit of measure, give the name, within quotation marks, as found on the unit being described." (RAD 6.3B)
trans-unit.target: "Achegue en Galego a escala en unidades de medida que se atopa na unidade que se describe. Se non hai equivalencia en Galego para o nome da unidade de medida, Achegue o nome, entre aspas, como se atopa na unidade que se describe." (RAD 6.3B)

trans-unit.source: "Give the name of the jurisdiction (e.g., government) responsible for issuing the philatelic records." (RAD 12.3B1) "For all units possessing a denomination (e.g., postage stamps, revenue stamps, postal stationery items), give the denomination in a standardized format, recording the denomination number in arabic numerals followed by the name of the currency unit. Include a denomination statement even if the denomination is already recorded as part of the title proper or other title information." (RAD 12.3C1)

trans-unit.target: Engadir un novo nome e/ou data

trans-unit.source: "At all levels record the extent of the unit being described by giving the number of physical units in arabic numerals and the specific material designation as instructed in subrule .5B in the chapter(s) dealing with the broad class(es) of material to which the unit being described belongs." (RAD 1.5B1) Include other physical details and dimensions as specified in RAD 1.5C and 1.5D. Separate multiple entries in this field with a carriage return (i.e. press the Enter key on your keyboard).
trans-unit.target: "En todos os niveis rexistre a extensión da unidade que se describe dando o número de unidades físicas en números árabigos e a designación específica do material, como se instrúe na subregra .5B no capítulo(s) que trata co ámpla clase(s) de material coa cal pertence a unidade que se describe." (RAD 1.5B1) Inclúa outros detalles físicos e dimensións como se especifica en RAD 1.5C e 1.5D. Separe entradas múltiples neste campo cun retorno de carro (ex. prema tecla Enter no seu teclado).

trans-unit.source: "At the item level of description, transcribe a title proper of the publisher's series as instructed in 1.1B1." (RAD 1.6B)
trans-unit.target: "No nivel de descrición de ítem, transcriba un título apropiado da serie do editor como se instrúe en 1.1B1." (RAD 1.6B)

trans-unit.source: "Transcribe parallel titles of a publisher's series as instructed in 1.1D." (RAD 1.6C1)
trans-unit.target: "Transcriba os títulos paralelos dunha serie editorial como se instrúe en 1.1D." (RAD 1.6C1)

trans-unit.source: "Transcribe other title information of a publisher's series as instructed in 1.1E and only if considered necessary for identifying the publisher's series." (RAD 1.6D1)
trans-unit.target: "Transcriba outra información do título dunha serie editorial como se instrúe en 1.1E e só se o considera necesario para identificar as series editoriais." (RAD 1.6D1)

trans-unit.source: "Transcribe explicit statements of responsibility appearing in conjunction with a formal title proper of a publisher's series as instructed in 1.1F and only if considered necessary for identifying the publisher's series." (RAD 1.6E1)
trans-unit.target: "Transcriba as declaracións de responsabilidade explícitas que aparezan en conxunto cun título formal apropiado das series editoriais, como se instrúe en 1.1F e solo se lo considera necesario para identificar as series editoriais." (RAD 1.6E1)

trans-unit.source: "Give the numbering of the item within a publisher's series in the terms given in the item." (RAD 1.6F1)
trans-unit.target: Achegue a numeración do ítem dentro dunha serie editorial nos termos dados no ítem." (RAD 1.6F1)

trans-unit.source: "Make notes on important details of publisher's series that are not included in the Publisher's series area, including variant series titles, incomplete series, and of numbers or letters that imply a series." (RAD 1.8B10)
trans-unit.target: "Faga notas sobre detalles importantes das series editoriais que non estean incluídas na área de series editoriais, incluíndo títulos de series variantes, series incompletas, e de números ou letras que implican unha serie." (RAD 1.8B10)

trans-unit.source: "Give the history of the custody of the unit being described, i.e., the successive transfers of ownership and custody or control of the material, along with the dates thereof, insofar as it can be ascertained." (RAD 1.7C)
trans-unit.target: "Achegue a historia da custodia da unidade que se describe, ex. As transferencias sucesivas de propiedade e custodia oo control do material, máis as datas dos mesmos, na medida en que se poidan determinar." (RAD 1.7C)

trans-unit.source: "At the fonds, series, and collection levels of description, and when necessary at the file and the item levels of description, indicate the level being described and give information about the scope and the internal structure of or arrangement of the records, and about their contents." (RAD 1.7D) "For the scope of the unit being described, give information about the functions and/or kinds of activities generating the records, the period of time, the subject matter, and the geographical area to which they pertain. For the content of the unit being described, give information about its internal structure by indicating its arrangement, organization, and/or enumerating its next lowest level of description. Summarize the principal documentary forms (e.g., reports, minutes, correspondence, drawings, speeches)." (RAD 1.7D1)
trans-unit.target: "Nos niveis de descrición de fondos, series e coleccións, e cando sexa necesario no arquivo e os niveis de descrición de fondo, indicar o nivel que se describe e entregar información sobre o alcance e a estructura interna do ou dos arranxos de rexistros, e sobre os seus contidos." (RAD 1.7D) "Para o alcance da unidade que se describe, entregar información sobre as súas funcións e/ou tipos de actividades xerando os rexistros, o período de tempo, a materia tema, e a área xeográfica á cal pertence. Para o contido da unidade que se describe, entregar información sobre a súa estructura interna indicando os seus arranxos, organización, e/ou enumerando o seu seguinte nivel de descrición máis baixo. Resumá forma principal documental (ex. reportes, minutas, correspondencia, debuxos, discursos)." (RAD 1.7D1)

trans-unit.source: "Make notes on the physical condition of the unit being described if that condition materially affects the clarity or legibility of the records." (RAD 1.8B9a)
trans-unit.target: "Faga notas sobre a condición física da unidade que se describe, se esa condición afecta materialmente á claridade ou lexibilidade dos rexistros." (RAD 1.8B9a)

trans-unit.source: "Record the donor or source (i.e., the immediate prior custodian) from whom the unit being described was acquired, and the date and method of acquisition, as well as the source/donor's relationship to the material, if any or all of this information is not confidential. If the source/donor is unknown, record that information." (RAD 1.8B12)
trans-unit.target: "Rexistrar o donante ou fonte (ex., o custodio inmediato anterior) dende os cales a unidade que se describe foi adquirida, e a data e método de adquisición, así como a relación da fonte/donante para o material, se cualquiera ou toda esta información no é confidencial. Se a fonte/donante é coñecida, rexistrar esa información." (RAD 1.8B12)

trans-unit.source: "Make notes on the arrangement of the unit being described which contribute significantly to its understanding but cannot be put in the Scope and content (see 1.7D), e.g., about reorganisation(s) by the creator, arrangement by the archivist, changes in the classification scheme, or reconstitution of original order." (RAD 1.8B13)

"Record the language or languages of the unit being described, unless they are noted elsewhere or are apparent from other elements of the description." (RAD 1.8.B14). Select the language from the drop-down menu; enter the first few letters to narrow the choices.
trans-unit.target: "Rexistre o idioma ou idiomas da unidade que se describe, a menos que foran anotados noutra parte ou sexa aparente dende outros elementos da descrición." (RAD 1.8.B14). Seleccione o idioma dende o menú despregable; ingrese as primeiras letras para reducir as alternativas.

trans-unit.source: "If the unit being described is a reproduction and the location of the original material is known, give that location. Give, in addition, any identifying numbers that may help in locating the original material in the cited location. If the originals are known to be no longer extant, give that information." (RAD 1.8B15a)

"If all or part of the unit being described is available (either in the institution or elsewhere) in another format(s), e.g., if the text being described is also available on microfilm; or if a film is also available on videocassette, make a note indicating the other format(s) in which the unit being described is available and its location, if that information is known. If only a part of the unit being described is available in another format(s), indicate which parts." (RAD 1.8B15b)
trans-unit.target: "Se todo ou parte da unidade que se describe está dispoñible (xa sexa na institución ou noutra parte) noutro(s) formato(s), ex. Se o texto que se describe tamén está dispoñible en microfilme; ou se unha filme tamén está dispoñible en cinta de video, faga unha nota indicando o outro formato(s) no cal a unidade que se describe está dispoñible e a súa localización, se esa información é coñecida. Se só unha parte da unidade que se describe está dispoñible noutro formato(s), indique que partes." (RAD 1.8B15b)

trans-unit.source: "Give information about any restrictions placed on access to the unit (or parts of the unit) being described." (RAD 1.8B16a)
trans-unit.target: "Achegue información sobre calquera restricción localizada no acceso á unidade (ou partes da unidade) que se describe." (RAD 1.8B16a)

trans-unit.source: "Give information regarding the existence of any finding aids. Include appropriate administrative and/or intellectual control tools over the material in existence at the time the unit is described, such as card catalogues, box lists, series lists, inventories, indexes, etc." (RAD 1.8B17)
trans-unit.target: "Achegue información relativa á existencia de calquera instrumento de descrición. Inclúa ferramientas administrativas e/ou control intelectual apropiadas sobre o material en existenciáo momento da descrición da unidade, tal como cartas de catalogación, listaxe de celas, listaxes de series, inventarios, índices, etc." (RAD 1.8B17)

trans-unit.source: For associated material, "If records in another institution are associated with the unit being described by virtue of the fact that they share the same provenance, make a citation to the associated material at the fonds, series or collection level, or for discrete items, indicating its location if known." (RAD 1.8B18). For related material, "Indicate groups of records having some significant relationship by reason of shared responsibility or shared sphere of activity in one or more units of material external to the unit being described." (RAD 1.8B20)
trans-unit.target: Para material asociado, "Se os rexistros noutra institución están asociados coa unidade que se describe en virtude do feito que comparten a mesma orixe, faga un citación ao material asociado a nivel de fondo, serie ou colección, ou para ítems individuais, indique a súa localización se esta é coñecida." (RAD 1.8B18). Para material relacionado, "Indicar os grupos de rexistros que tenn alguna relación significativa en razón de responsabilidade compartida o esferea compartida de actividade, en unha o máis unidades de material externas á unidade que se describe." (RAD 1.8B20)

trans-unit.source: "When the unit being described is not yet complete, e.g., an open fonds or series, make a note explaining that further accruals are expected... If no further accruals are expected, indicate that the unit is considered closed." (RAD 1.8B19)
trans-unit.target: "Cando a unidade que se describe aínda non está completa, por exemplo un fondo ou unha serie aberta, crear unha nota explicando as adiciones de información que se esperan... Se no se esperádicionar máis información á unidade, indicar que a unidade se considera cerrada." (RAD 1.8B19)

trans-unit.source: "Give the International Standard Book Number (ISBN), International Standard Serial Number (ISSN), or any other internationally agreed standard number for the item being described. Give such numbers with the agreed abbreviation and with the standard spacing or hyphenation." (RAD 1.9B1)
trans-unit.target: "Achegue o Número estandar Internacional de Libro (siglas en inglés ISBN), Número estandar Internacional de Publicacións periódicas (sigla en iglés ISSN), ou calquera outro número estandar internacional convenido para o ítem que se describe. Achegue ditos números coabreviación convida e coa separación estandar ou guións.
Puntos de acceso á área temática

trans-unit.source: Search for an existing term in the Subjects taxonomy by typing the first few characters of the term. Alternatively, type a new term to create and link to a new subject term.
Search for an existing term in the Places taxonomy by typing the first few characters of the term name. Alternatively, type a new term to create and link to a new place term.

"Choose provenance, author and other non-subject access points from the archival description, as appropriate. All access points must be apparent from the archival description to which they relate." (RAD 21.0B) The values in this field are drawn from the Authorized form of name field in authority records. Search for an existing name by typing the first few characters of the name. Alternatively, type a new name to create and link to a new authority record.

Record a unique description identifier in accordance with local and/or national conventions. If the description is to be used internationally, record the code of the country in which the description was created in accordance with the latest version of ISO 3166 - Codes for the representation of names of countries. Where the creator of the description is an international organisation, give the organisational identifier in place of the country code.

Record the full authorised form of name(s) of the agency(ies) responsible for creating, modifying or disseminating the description or, alternatively, record a code for the agency in accordance with the national or international agency code standard.
Record the international, national and/or local rules or conventions followed in preparing the description.
trans-unit.target: Rexistre as regras ou convencións internacionais, nacionais e/ou locais seguidas na preparación da descrición.

trans-unit.source: Record the current status of the description, indicating whether it is a draft, finalized and/or revised or deleted.
trans-unit.target: Rexistro o estado actual da descrición, indicando se é un borrador, se está finalizado e/ou revisado ou borrado.

trans-unit.source: Record whether the description consists of a minimal, partial or full level of detail in accordance with relevant international and/or national guidelines and/or rules.
trans-unit.target: Rexistrar se a descrición consiste nun nivel de detalle mínimo, parcial ou completo dacordo aos liñamentos e/ou regras internacionais e/ou nacionais relevantes.

trans-unit.source: Record the date(s) the entry was prepared and/or revised.
trans-unit.target: Rexistre a(s) data(s) en que a entrada foi preparada e/ou revisada.

trans-unit.source: Indicate the language(s) used to create the description of the archival material.
trans-unit.target: Indicar os idioma(s) usados para crear a descrición do material de arquivo.

trans-unit.source: Indicate the script(s) used to create the description of the archival material.
trans-unit.target: Indicar a escritura(s) empregada para crear a descrición do material de arquivo.

trans-unit.source: Edition statement - This is a mandatory element for published items if there are multiple editions.

"Use this area only in item level description to record statements relating to versions of items existing in two or more versions or states in single or multiple copies." (RAD 1.2A1) "Transcribe the edition statement relating to the item being described." (RAD 1.2B1) "If the item being described lacks an edition statement but is known to contain significant changes from other editions, supply a suitable brief statement in the language and script of the title proper and enclose it in square brackets." (RAD 1.2B3)
"Note any distinctive alphabets or symbol systems employed." (RAD 1.8.B14) Select the script from the drop-down menu; enter the first few letters to narrow the choices.

"Record the language or languages of the unit being described, unless they are noted elsewhere or are apparent from other elements of the description. Also note any distinctive alphabets or symbol systems employed." (RAD 1.8B14). Do not duplicate information added via the drop-down in the language or script fields.

For terms governing use and reproduction, "Give information on legal or donor restrictions that may affect use or reproduction of the material." (RAD 1.8B16c). For terms governing publication, "Give information on legal or donor restrictions that may affect publication of the material." (RAD 1.8B16d)
Record citations for any external sources used in the archival description (such as the Scope and Content, Custodial History, or Notes fields).

To create a relationship between this description and another description held in AtoM, begin typing the name of the related description and select it from the autocomplete drop-down menu when it appears below. Multiple relationships can be created.

Identifier: Enter an unambiguous code used to uniquely identify the description. Level: Select a level of description from the drop-down menu. See RAD 1.0A for rules and conventions on selecting levels of description. Title: Enter the title proper, either transcribed or supplied. (RAD 1.1B)
Search for an existing term in the Genre taxonomy by typing the first few characters of the term name. Alternatively, type a new term to create and link to a new genre term.
